title.rendered: Cosmopolitan Bench Seating – plain backrest – price per metre

content.rendered:
Give your venue a Cosmopolitan touch! The luxurious Cosmopolitan range is the latest incarnation of our popular bench seating system. Combining soft, upholstered seating with a ridged, Russian red wood frame this bespoke product can be made in a variety of lengths, depths and with our sumptuous Seren+ faux leathers, the Cosmopolitan range is a superb addition to any restaurant, bar or club. 

Prices per metre (includes standard Seren+ fabrics and wood finishes shown – call for C.O.M or bespoke sizes)

HANDMADE IN THE U.K.
